headline: NeOnc Technologies Appoints Renowned Neuro-Oncologist Dr. Henry S. Friedman to Scientific Advisory Board
summary: CALABASAS, Calif., Sept. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NeOnc Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NTHI) (“NeOnc” or the “Company”), a multi-Phase 2 clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company pioneering therapies for central nervous system (CNS) cancers, today announced it has appointed Dr. Henry S. Friedman to its scientific advisory board. Dr. Friedman is an internationally renowned academic adult and pediatric neuro-oncologist who helps to lead The Preston Robert Tisch Brain Tumor Center at Duke Universi
